Elusive Core: Zero Trace

Elusive Core: Zero Trace is a stealth platformer that I worked on in 3rd year of CGAD, together with 7 other students of various roles.

It's made in Unity, and I helped design the game as well as program it.

Our team was accepted into DARE Academy in 2025, where we expanded on the game and improved it greatly.

Unity Pixel Shader

This is a shader I developed in Unity. It pixelizes a 3D scene, and uses outlines and a simple toon shader to mimic the iconic pixel art style.

Hex the Witch Cat

Hex the Witch Cat is a demo of a turn based RPG that I made for a uni module in 1st year.

It is programmed entirely by me, in SFML. The art and animations of the characters, enemies, and UI is also created by me
